title: Blended Learning-Based Project Design for Anomaly Data Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment combining virtual laboratories (VRL) and hands-on experiments (HOL). Learners collect and analyze data using personal devices in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Identify anomalous data generated in virtual labs (VRL) and explain at least three root causes
Statistically analyze anomalous data collected from hands-on labs (HOL) and present at least two interpretation models
Document anomalous data processing procedures step-by-step through project-based collaboration and create presentation materials
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
